name: Blue Jumpman
description:
As you see in the beginning of the game; the princess has been murdered by the evil assassin yox. you must bring vengeance upon them and destroy them in order for them to repay the kind favor... Fight the epic sices and yoxs to destroy all of them and return peace to this horribly altered land that is jump-land.

ver:2.0 beta Full game updated: added 2nd player and better graphics

This is a platformer-shooter with a destructible environment. I believe it is the first of it's kind. The game is exceedingly hard so good luck. I hope you all enjoy it. By the way there's 24 levels and I hope you can beat them all.

Controls: Z-shoot left, X-shoot right, Arrow keys-move, R-restart room

p2 controla: numpad 8 up, 4 left, 6 right, 7 shoot left, 9 shoot right

Note- there are bugs and this is still not finished but in beta

<3 Blue Jumpman Dev Team
